page.title: 18HOUSING IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content: The bulk of housing in the Breich Valley is owned by the Local } Authority.In Addiewell there is one large mansion,called Loganlea House,situated at the top of the village.Apart from that the only private housing is that which has been bought from the council or the one remaining miners'row where the houses have all been modernised and sold.It is much the same story in Breich although in Stoneyburn there has been a bit of private building during the last ten years. Most of the Local Authority housing in all three villages is post war.Stoneyburn has the biggest variety of housing including a number of blocks of flats.
